Package de.payleven.payment

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DevicePreparationListener
    Reacts on preparing a new device for payment.
    EventLogger
    Defines an interface for logging events.
    Payleven
    In order to start accepting payment through payleven you need to instantiated a Payleven object.
    PaylevenRegistrationListener
    Reacts on the result of the payleven registration.
    PaymentListener
    Reacts on the payment completion or the error during the payment process.
    PaymentProgressListener
    Called when the payment progress state changed.
    PaymentTask
    Allows to start a payment.
    ReceiptGenerator
    Contains methods to construct and draw receipt layout.
    RefundListener
    Reacts on the refund completion or the error during the refund process.
    RefundTask
    Allows to make refunds of the previous payments.
    SignatureRequestListener
    Called when signature is required to verify a payment.
    SignatureResponseHandler
    Used to provide client's signature to payleven library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Device
    Holds information about a valid bluetooth device that can be used for a payment.
    GeoLocation
    Simple holder of the geo location coordinates.
    PairedDevice
    Holds information about a payleven bluetooth device paired with the current android device.
    PaylevenCommunicationService
    Used for internal needs but must be included into AndroidManifest.xml.
    PaylevenFactory
    Produces Payleven instance which is authorized and configured to make payments.
    PaylevenPaymentTask
    Allows to start a payment.
    PaymentRequest
    Contains the data required in order to make a payment.
    PaymentResult
    Contains payment data which is available after the payment completion.
    PaymentResult.AdditionalData
    Additional data available for the payment.
    ReceiptConfig
    Represent a configuration required for rendering payment data on the receipt.
    ReceiptConfig.Builder
    Helper class for building ReceiptConfig.
    RefundRequest
    Contains the data required to make a refund.
    RefundResult
    Contains refund data which is available after the refund completion.
    RefundResultData
    Contains refund data which is available after the refund completion.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Cvm
    Values of the cardholder verification method.
    PaymentProgressState
    States during a payment progress.
    PaymentState
    Describes the state the payment may be in.
    PosEntryMode
    Describes the way card data was provided.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthorizationError
    Error that is thrown because the request was not authorised by the backend.
    BluetoothError
    Error that is thrown because execution was interrupted due to bluetooth communication problem.
    ConfigurationError
    Error that is thrown because execution was interrupted because Payleven was configured with invalid data.
    DeviceError
    Error that is thrown because execution was interrupted due to the problems with the device.
    NetworkError
    Error that is thrown because execution was interrupted due to unreachable network.
    PaylevenError
    A base for all errors which can occur in the API.
    RefundError
    Error that is thrown because PaylevenRefundTask has failed.
    ServerError
    Error that is thrown if the server has returned an http error code or unexpected response.
